sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Card, Container, FloatingLabel, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import useServiceDetail from '../../hooks/useServiceDetail'; const Checkout = () => { const { serviceId } = useParams(); const [service] = useServiceDetail(serviceId); const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: 'jhon', email: 'john@gmail.com', address: 'taj mahal', phone: '07844654654' }) return (

{service.name}

{service.description}

Please Checkout your booking
); }; export default Checkout;
